div.ab: To clear sight: Take surfili (chervil) and let it boil in water, and put the same water in the eye. So will he be healed, certainly.
When one has a stye on the eye: Take [unknown, probably a plant?] and make it boil in water, and put it on as a plaster. So will he be healed, certainly.

One who has red in the eye and heat: he should take rose water and lapis amicitis (amosite?), and he should mix it all through one another, and he should put (some) of the water in the eye. So will he be healed, certainly.

For the eyes: take a (???) from a (???), and the (???) from tsidionima, and honey, and mix them together, so that one (will have?) (???) good sight, certainly, and he (will) be lightened/illuminated(?).
